TopicTitle: Can you replace normal maps with MM configs?

Articles.Content:
Hello, and I want to know what I can do to change the X200-16's normal map to a flatter one generated using a custom texture. Can I use MM configs to replace it? If not, what can I do, because I want to redistribute the mod. I'd want that to be synced with FS Texture Switch 2

Thanks, Bottle Rocketeer

Edited July 16, 2017 by Bottle Rocketeer 500

Think it was in gimp not sure what your using but there was away you could add like a normal map to your texture has one file not sure on MM changing the normal haven't seen it done as texture and normal maps both are set in unity
I have both GIMP and Photoshop, and if you can replace textures with MM configs, why not replace normal maps with them?

5 minutes ago, Bottle Rocketeer 500 said:

I have both GIMP and Photoshop, and if you can replace textures with MM configs, why not replace normal maps with them?

Have you tried to change it ? It might just be has easy has targeting the name of the normal map with MM that tank looks like its name is model001 for the normal map ?

EDIT- Just the texture is model000

Edited July 16, 2017 by Mecripp2
edited

Haven't tried, but I want to sync it with FS Tex Switch 2

Currently trying to add with MM configs.

An example of a mod part with FS switched normal maps:

https://github.com/raveloda/Coatl-Aerospace/blob/v0.15BETA/GameData/Coatl Aerospace/ProbesPlus/Parts/Command/quetzal.cfg#L177-L185

Oh, thanks, Probes Plus used to be one of my mods that I always used before I had a corrupted game due to using an incompatible old version of VSR which replaced stock textures, I never knew that it used FS Tex switch
